casebody.data:
AMES H. CHAMBERS, Appellant, v. WILLIAM A. APPLETON, et al., Respondents.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Russell, J.

Decided November 22, 1880. Appeal by plaintiff from order of reference. *578Wm. W. Badger, attorney, and Wm. R. Beach, of counsel, for appellants. Douglas Campbell, for respondent. Per Curiam.

Order affirmed, with ten dollars costs and disbursements.
